message: I've had inconsistent results with cron jobs over the past 3-4 days; typically when the job does not finish the error message looks something like this:

[cron] Running script u'manage.py update senate' for app 26287 (time is now 0 17 2
[cron] Lost connection to runner; cron job
previously it had been working fairly well, but i've seen repeated errors during the past few days.

Yes, we've been having some intermittent load problems on our runners, which sometimes causes a connection to drop. The task itself is finishing fine, the log messages just aren't getting back - we're looking into it.
ok, thanks. In some cases, though, I've noticed that the task isn't finishing too.
